amendment.description: Amendment changes section 311 requiring the Secretary of Energy to submit only a report that provides an analysis of alternatives for each major warhead refurbishment program that reaches Phase 6.3.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to amend section 311 requiring the Secretary of Energy to submit a report that provides an analysis of alternitives for each major warhead refurbishment program that reaches Phase 6.3.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Frelinghuysen amendment (A039) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Frelinghuysen amendment (A039) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A039) offered by Mr. Frelinghuysen.
